name: Pneumonia
title: Pneumonia
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for a diagnosis of  pneumonia.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent a diagnosis of pneumonia.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
